name: Can you dig it? (Flipsy)
description:
(r) to restart Can You Dig It - A Ludum Dare 48 Entry

Plunge deeper and deeper into the subterranean realms of earth and mind. Dig-dug meets boulder-dash meets psychedelia. A fast, fun arcade game. 

By Tim and Amanda Cox

Controls

- Arrow keys or ASD to move (you can't go up only deeper and deeper)

- r to restart
